AT.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
AT.description: Entdecke "SUPER MARIO 3D LAND"! Mario Fans und solche die es werden, erleben erstmals ein Jump'n'Run in 3D-Landschaften: Entfernungen wirken tiefer, rennen und springen wirkt dynamischer und die spaßige Welt von Mario kommt noch näher! In 3D ist Super Mario in Bestform. Und Du hoffentlich auch! Sitzen wie angegossen! Nicht nur Spaß und Herausforderung, sondern auch die unterschiedlichen Outfits von Mario. Zum Beispiel der Waschbärenanzug! Der sieht aber nicht nur gut aus. Mit dem Schwanz des Waschbärenanzuges fegst Du Gegner vom Boden und segelst leicht wie eine Feder, wenn du aus großen Höhen herunterspringst. Setz dir herausfordernde Ziele! "SUPER MARIO 3D LAND" bietet ein komplett neues Spielerlebnis, mit neuen Gegnern und vielen neuen Fähigkeiten. Dabei sind neue Spielstrategien gefordert! Stell dich der Herausforderung! Erreiche die Zielflagge entweder, in dem Du voll auf Marios einzigartige Bewegungen setzt – oder nutze seine neuen Fähigkeiten. Halte die Augen offen und entdecke viele versteckte Abkürzungen. Das ist das ganze Erfolgsgeheimnis!

AU.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
AU.description: SUPER MARIO 3D LAND reinvents everything fans love about Mario gaming with the first platforming environment in true 3D, presenting a 3D Mario game that plays like a 2D Mario game! Players will experience an exhilarating new sense of depth, distance and speed while running, jumping and stomping on enemies throughout the levels. Among other outfits for Mario, the fan-favourite Tanooki Suit makes a comeback. Use the Tanooki Suit’s tail to attack enemies or float gently down from great heights. Accessible and challenging in equal measure, SUPER MARIO 3D LAND offers new and familiar abilities that add unique gameplay strategies to the adventure! Make your way to the end-of-level flagpole using Mario's signature moves- or try to apply his new skills in challenging ways if you dare to discover every hidden shortcut and secret!

BG.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
BG.description: SUPER MARIO 3D LAND reinvents everything fans love about Mario gaming with the first platforming environment in true 3D, presenting a 3D Mario game that plays like a 2D Mario game! Players will experience an exhilarating new sense of depth, distance and speed while running, jumping and stomping on enemies throughout the levels. Among other outfits for Mario, the fan-favourite Tanooki Suit makes a comeback. Use the Tanooki Suit’s tail to attack enemies or float gently down from great heights. Accessible and challenging in equal measure, SUPER MARIO 3D LAND offers new and familiar abilities that add unique gameplay strategies to the adventure! Make your way to the end-of-level flagpole using Mario's signature moves- or try to apply his new skills in challenging ways if you dare to discover every hidden shortcut and secret!

BE.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
BE.description: Super Mario 3D Land réinvente tout ce que les fans avaient adoré dans les précédentes aventures de Mario et les transporte pour la première fois dans un univers en véritable 3D ! Les joueurs vont découvrir la profondeur du jeu dans tous les sens du terme. Au fil des niveaux, distance et vitesse vont se faire ressentir dans les courses, les sauts et tout particulièrement les sauts sur les ennemis. Parmi les costumes de Mario, le Costume Tanuki, véritable chouchou des fans, fait son grand retour. Servez-vous de la queue du Costume Tanuki pour attaquer les ennemis ou planer tranquillement en partant des plates-formes les plus hautes. Accessible mais aussi exigeant, Super Mario 3D Land vous propose des capacités, nouvelles ou déjà bien connues, qui ajoutent à l'aventure une touche stratégique originale ! Frayez-vous un chemin jusqu'au drapeau de fin de niveau en faisant bon usage des mouvements spéciaux de Mario, ou tentez d'exploiter vos nouvelles capacités de façon plus audacieuse en vous aventurant dans tous les raccourcis cachés pour y découvrir des secrets !

ES.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
ES.description: Super Mario 3D Land reinventa todo lo que Mario ha sido con el primer entorno de plataformas en verdadero 3D, ¡con un juego de Mario en 3D que se juega como si fuera bidimensional! Los jugadores vivirán una excitante y nueva sensación de profundidad, distancia y velocidad mientras corren, saltan y golpean a los enemigos a lo largo de los distintos niveles. Entre otros trajes de Mario, el traje de mapache, que tan irresistible es para muchos fans, vuelve a hacer acto de presencia. Usa la cola del traje de mapache para atacar a los enemigos y flotar ligeramente al caer desde mucha altura. Accesible y desafiante a partes iguales, Super Mario 3D Land ofrece unas habilidades nuevas y clásicas que le dan ese toque de estrategia a la aventura. Ábrete camino hasta la barra del final del nivel con los movimientos característicos de Mario, o prueba a aplicar estas nuevas habilidades de formas desafiantes para descubrir los atajos y secretos.

IT.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
IT.description: Super Mario 3D Land reinventa lo stile tanto amato dai fan di Mario, offrendo un gioco di Mario in 3D giocabile come un classico platform in 2D! Proverai uno sconvolgente senso di profondità, distanza e velocità mentre corri, salti o schiacci i tuoi nemici nei vari livelli. Tra le trasformazioni di Mario, torna quella preferita dai fan, Mario Tanooki. Utilizza il Mario Tanooki per attaccare i nemici oppure fluttua dolcemente da grandi altezze. Accessibile e impegnativo in egual misura, Super Mario 3D Land include nuove e vecchie abilità che aggiungono all'avventura strategie di gioco uniche! Arriva vincitore alla fine di ogni livello utilizzando le mosse classiche di Mario, oppure cerca di utilizzare le nuove tecniche in modi ingegnosi per scoprire ogni scorciatoia e segreto nascosto!

NL.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
NL.description: In SUPER MARIO 3D LAND is alles wat de fans leuk vinden aan Mario in een nieuwe vorm gegoten! Dit eerste 3D-platformspel levert een compleet nieuwe driedimensionale beleving, maar speelt, verrassend genoeg, net als de oude 2D-spellen van Mario! Beleef een spannend nieuw gevoel van diepte, afstand en snelheid terwijl je door de levels rent, springt en van vijand naar vijand stuitert. Mario kan weer verschillende kostuums dragen, waaronder de comeback van een klassieker: het Tanooki Suit. Gebruik de staart van het Tanooki Suit om vijanden aan te vallen of vanaf grote hoogte langzaam omlaag te zweven. SUPER MARIO 3D LAND is even toegankelijk als uitdagend en zit vol bekende en nieuwe mogelijkheden die samenkomen in een uniek avontuur! Gebruik Mario's legendarische sprongen om de vlaggenmast aan het einde van het level te bereiken, en vergeet onderweg niet met zijn vaardigheden te experimenteren om alle verborgen routes en extra's te ontdekken!

NZ.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
NZ.description: SUPER MARIO 3D LAND reinvents everything fans love about Mario gaming with the first platforming environment in true 3D, presenting a 3D Mario game that plays like a 2D Mario game! Players will experience an exhilarating new sense of depth, distance and speed while running, jumping and stomping on enemies throughout the levels. Among other outfits for Mario, the fan-favourite Tanooki Suit makes a comeback. Use the Tanooki Suit’s tail to attack enemies or float gently down from great heights. Accessible and challenging in equal measure, SUPER MARIO 3D LAND offers new and familiar abilities that add unique gameplay strategies to the adventure! Make your way to the end-of-level flagpole using Mario's signature moves- or try to apply his new skills in challenging ways if you dare to discover every hidden shortcut and secret!

PT.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
PT.description: SUPER MARIO 3D LAND traz de volta tudo o que os fãs de Mario adoram com o primeiro ambiente de plataforma em 3D num jogo Mario em 3D que se joga como um jogo Mario em 2D! Os jogadores experienciarão uma nova sensação de profundidade, distância e velocidade enquanto correm, saltam e atacam inimigos numa variedade de níveis! Entre os muitos fatos de Mario, o Tanooki Suit, querido dos fãs, regressa em força. Usa a sua cauda para atacares inimigos ou deslizares suavemente a partir de grandes alturas. Tão acessível quanto desafiante, SUPER MARIO 3D LAND oferece habilidades, novas ou conhecidas, que proporcionam estratégias únicas à aventura! Tenta chegar até à haste de fim de nível com as jogadas caraterísticas de Mario ou tenta aplicar as suas novas habilidades de formas desafiantes se te atreveres a descobrir cada atalho secreto.

RU.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
RU.description: В SUPER MARIO 3D LAND есть все то, что любили поклонники первых платформенных игр Mario, только теперь действие происходит в трех измерениях. Это как 2D Mario, но в 3D! Бегите, прыгайте, побеждайте врагов, проходите уровень за уровнем и наслаждайтесь кружащим голову ощущением глубины, дистанции и скорости. Среди разнообразных костюмов для Mario в этой игре поклонники найдут полюбившийся костюм Tanooki. Используйте хвост костюма Tanooki, чтобы атаковать врагов или плавно спускаться вниз. Доступная, но вместе с тем совсем непростая игра SUPER MARIO 3D LAND содержит и новые, и хорошо знакомые возможности, которые делают геймплей этого приключения действительно уникальным. Пройдите путь от начала и до конца: до знаменитого флажка, означающего «конец уровня», используя знаменитые движения Mario, или попытайтесь использовать его новые способности в непростых ситуациях, если вам, конечно, хватит смелости найти секреты и пройти по скрытым дорогам.

SE.name: Super Mario 3D Land™
SE.description: SUPER MARIO 3D LAND reinvents everything fans love about Mario gaming with the first platforming environment in true 3D, presenting a 3D Mario game that plays like a 2D Mario game! SK.description: SUPER MARIO 3D LAND reinvents everything fans love about Mario gaming with the first platforming environment in true 3D, presenting a 3D Mario game that plays like a 2D Mario game! Players will experience an exhilarating new sense of depth, distance and speed while running, jumping and stomping on enemies throughout the levels. Among other outfits for Mario, the fan-favourite Tanooki Suit makes a comeback. Use the Tanooki Suit’s tail to attack enemies or float gently down from great heights. Accessible and challenging in equal measure, SUPER MARIO 3D LAND offers new and familiar abilities that add unique gameplay strategies to the adventure! Make your way to the end-of-level flagpole using Mario's signature moves- or try to apply his new skills in challenging ways if you dare to discover every hidden shortcut and secret!
